author: CmsHI
body: HIN Voronoi algorithm update for 7_4_X. The UE calibration can be optionally supplied as text files (as in 5_3_X), or as a JetCorrectionParametersCollection of type L1Offset, where the parameter vector is reused for calibration coefficient purpose (this is implemented since the HeavyIonUERcd/UETable is not yet in pre6).
title: HIN Voronoi algorithm update
